Tyrael thought for a moment. As he was absorbed by the projects he ahd 
in mind about the engine piece, he had barely noticed the pods 
touching down.

Tyrael: I will not include chips on them the way I did with you, 
Cheetah, if I have your guarantee that they will be loyal to our 
cause. Go get them. Tyrael out.

He returned to the study of Burrock's blasted whip-like tentacle.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Tankor <lordofdarkness11001@y...> wrote:
> 
> CHEETAH:" Tyrael weve got a new  pod. please if you can dont put 
that chip in this pod like you did with me. i recognize this make of 
pod. on four were made mine, tigerhawk,silverbolt and tankor
>  Tankor wrote:
> a new pod comes crashing 200 miles west of the triped base.(if thats 
water so be it)
> 
> 2 more start to land near the pread base. one lands 200 miles west 
the other
> 200 miles north
> 
> 
> 
> Cybers Will Rule. Trippa Will Rule.  Troppo Will Rule. Bropo Will

Tankor64's Factions. Which Are Really His.
